data.comment: The big names in today's match at John Smith's Stadium have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Derby County with the kick-off.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
The second-half has commenced. Huddersfield with the kick-off.
Juninho Bacuna scores to make it 1-0 at John Smith's Stadium.
In the minute 55, Carlos Corberan (Huddersfield) is making a first substitution, with Christopher Schindler replacing Isaac Mbenza.
Martyn Waghorn is on a sub for Graeme Shinnie for Derby County.
Derby County make their second substitution with Duane Holmes replacing Tom Lawrence.
In the minute 65, The home team have replaced Carel Eiting with Lewis O'Brien. This is the second substitution made today by Carlos Corberan.
The away team replace Lee Buchanan with Kazim.
Demeaco Duhaney is replacing Pipa for the home team.
In the minute 84, Nathan Byrne (Derby County) has received a yellow card from David Webb.
Fraizer Campbell for Huddersfield has been booked by David Webb and receives a first yellow card.
David Webb blows to end the match. The final score is 1-0.
Andre Wisdom (Derby County) has received a first yellow card.
Martyn Waghorn (Derby County) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
